altTitles.ja: ひばりの朝

description.en: Teshima Hibari is a 14-year-old girl with a body that is more sensual than most girls her age. Her story includes the opinions and reactions of all of the people around her, as well as the actions of her own life. The chapters explore the thoughts and feelings of classmates and adults, men and women. The males often have romantic or sexual feelings for Hibari, while the women sometimes have feelings of inferiority or jealousy. Whether positive or negative, it seems everyone has a reaction to Hibari.

A man who reincarnated in another world as a 9th class wizard and retired after saving the continent from a dragon war. He decides to open a small restaurant in the countryside, but his routine is anything but ordinary. 

On the second floor of his restaurant, there lives a black dragon who has transformed into a woman, named Rurin. She is greedy, cute and loyal to him, but also ignorant and clueless about the human world. 

They live a fun and warm life, serving customers, solving problems and growing violets in the garden.
description.ko:
요리사를 꿈꾸던 내가 사고로 이세계에 떨어졌다.

몬스터와 마법이 넘쳐나는 판타지 세계이지만 여기라고 식당을 못할 건 없잖아?

그러나 전쟁으로 인해 이세계에 들어오자마자 군대에 끌려가게 되고,
...

description.en:
This is the tale of a boy dreaming about infinity as a human!

Found abandoned in a stable, Shirone is the son of a hunter—and a peasant through and through.
Despite hardships, he's a genius that manages to learn to read by himself and becomes obsessed with it.

Brimming with genius talent, he goes to the city with his father, where he learns about magic—
beginning his journey as an explosive rising star!

description.de:
Sie lebt für ihren Beruf und arbeitet zu viel — bis sie an Überarbeitung zusammenbricht und stirbt. Doch statt ihre Augen für immer zu schliessen, erwacht sie in einer Märchenwelt. Sie steckt im Körper der bösen Stiefmutter! Aber wie kann sie nur das Vertrauen ihrer Stieftochter aewinnen?

Spieglein, Spieglein an der Wand, wer ist die netteste Stiefmutter im ganzen Land?

description.en:
Fairytale stepmothers are notoriously wicked. But after a children’s clothing designer is reborn as young Princess Blanche’s stepmom, she’s determined to break the mold and shower her daughter with love. Now she just has to convince the girl’s cold-hearted father to do the same. In her quest to make a happier home for Blanche, Abigail begins to uncover secrets and schemes within the palace. Will devious forces tear the Freidkins apart, or can Abigail stitch them back into a family?

---

description.fr:
J'ai été transmigrée en le parfait cliché de la belle-mère jalouse et cruelle! Une mauvaise femme qui a énormément fait souffrir l'adorable Blanche, finissant même par l'empoisonner. Heureusement, le destin se retourne contre elle et la belle-mère finit exécutée par son mari.

Ma petite Blanche est tellement mignonne, je veux la couvrir d'affection et de tous les cadeaux possibles.

Sauf que pendant ce temps là, mon mari pense qu'il s'agit d'un nouveau stratagème pour attirer son attention, mais la seule que je veux, c'est ma belle-fille!

---
Réincarnée en la méchante belle mère de Blanche neige, je ferai tout pour gagné l'amour de cette enfante. Cependant, un obstacle de taille ce dressera sur ma route.

«Je suis aussi le parent de Blanche, j'exige des excuses pour m'avoir tellement méfié.»

«Et si je ne le fait pas?»

«Je viendrais visiter votre chambre ce soir, majesté.»

«...»

«J'ai même réussi a obtenir des culottes vraiment sexy juste pour vous~»

---

我穿越成了白雪公主的恶毒继母？！但是前世的我其实是一个非常喜欢小孩子的儿童服装设计师。明明面对可爱的女儿喜不自禁，但是不论怎么努力，都得不到女儿和丈夫的信任。丈夫觉得我态度大转变，定有阴谋。我到底如何才能在这个充满怀疑的新世界成功的活下去…？

title.en: Cutie's Here: Mommy, Where's My Daddy?

altTitles.zh: 萌宝来袭：妈咪我爹地呢？

altTitles.zh-ro: Meng Bao Laixi: Mommy Wo Daddy Ne?

description.en:
The female lead, Ye Xiange, used to be a trainee within Linshan Entertainment. Before she could officially debut however, she was plagued by scandals and her nudes were all over the media. The company terminated the contract with her and she was also cheated by her boyfriend. What she didn’t expect most was that she suddenly had a five year old son after waking up. What the hell? Child, who’s your mommy? And who’s your daddy?

---

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

description.en:
Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games.

Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them.

As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...!

But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected....
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...
description.pt-br: Os valentões locais atormentaram Kotaro quando ele era jovem. Eles eram o lutador habilidoso Akari. Kanae, um prodígio do basquete, e Shigure, um prodígio dos videogames. Todos os dias, Kotaro competia contra esses três caras em seus respectivos esportes com a intenção de vencer. Infelizmente, ele não era páreo para eles. No último ano do ensino médio, Kotaro agora tem outra oportunidade de enfrentá-los e exigir sua retribuição…! Mas ele descobrirá um segredo que nunca teria esperado…

title.en: Tsuitenai Game Jikkyousha wa Akogare no Hito ni Kakinsareru

altTitles.ja: ツイてないゲーム実況者は憧れの人に課金される

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuitenai Game jikkyousha wa akogare no hito ni kakin sareru

description.en:
"Hasumi, a university student who meets with misfortune whenever she does anything, is interested in Oikawa, who helped her out at the entrance ceremony.
However, when she steels herself to talk to him, he doesn't even remember her... Then, at the suggestion of her older brother, who noticed how amusing Hasumi's game-playing was, she decides to livestream a let's play. The video unexpectedly goes viral, and Oikawa has found it too...?

Gaming livestreamer x unlaughing guy—who will be the one to get hooked?"

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の魔女、始めました ～私だけ『攻略サイト』を見れる世界で自由に生きます～

altTitles.en: I Became the World's Strongest Witch: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can Access the "Guide Site"
The World's Strongest Witch Has Begun - I Will Live Freely In A World Where Only I Can View The "Strategy Site" -

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

description.en: The world is riddled with beasts and demons, however little do people know that a magical barrier is currently sealing away high-level demons. There are those who wish to break the barrier and bring about the end of the world, and those who wish to protect it and its inhabitants. A great battle with heroes, villains, demons and magic is about to begin and will determine the fate of the world.

description.en:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.  
Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.

---

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

description.en:
Bell Cranel is just trying to find his way in the world. Of course, in his case, the “world” is an enormous dungeon filled with monsters below a city run by gods and goddesses with way too much time on their hands. He’s got big dreams but not much more when a roll on the random encounter die brings him face-to-face with the girl of his dreams—but what’s an amateur adventurer got to offer a brilliant swords woman? And what if the lonely goddess who sponsors his solo adventuring gets jealous?

(Series was cancelled in 2018 for an unknown reason and restarted in 2020 under a sequel title.)

И именно здесь парень, мечтающий стать авантюристом, знакомится с маленькой богиней, не нашедшей ни одного последователя.

У него нет ни друзей, ни подруг, а на вопрос о том, какая у него цель в жизни, можно услышать лишь ответ, что ее нет. Но не все безразличны к апатии Хачимана. Его учительница просит школьника стать волонтером клуба помощи, в котором также находится самая красивая девушка школы. Как изменит членство в клубе жизнь Хачимана? description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---

description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

description.en: Goryo Daisuke is still unsure about which club to join. When he meets the three girl members of Mysterious Research Club while looking for the school's warehouse, he gets hypnotized to sign the registration form. Suzu who is obsessed with scary curses, Chiaki who only relies on her monstrous strength to perform dangerous magic tricks, and Kotone who can control people by hypnosis.
description.es-la: Goryou Daiseuke aún está indeciso sobre a qué club unirse en su escuela. Cuando conoce a tres chicas miembros del “Club de Investigaciones Misteriosas” mientras buscaba el almacén de la escuela, es hipnotizado por ellas y, sin saberlo, firma una solicitud de ingreso. Suzu, quien está obsesionada con las maldiciones, Chiaki quien confía en su monstruosa fuerza para realizar actos de magia y Kotone, quien puede controlar a la gente con hipnosis. Ahora comienza una nueva y caótica vida para Daisuke, siendo el conejillo de indias del club.
description.pt-br: Goryo Daisuke ainda não sabe ao certo a qual clube ingressar. Quando ele conhece as três garotas do Clube de Pesquisa Misteriosa enquanto procura o depósito da escola, ele fica hipnotizado para assinar o formulário de inscrição. Suzu, que é obcecada por maldições assustadoras, Chiaki, que só conta com sua força monstruosa para realizar truques de mágica perigosos, e Kotone, que pode controlar as pessoas por meio da hipnose.

description.en: Story is based on three childhood friends. A girl who lost her memory, Miyuki. A girl who is a currently a super idol, Fumika. And Shuichi, a childhood friend of Miyuki and Fumika, who likes to take photographs. Two years ago, Miyuki lost her memory by an accident and she kept a distance from people but somehow she begins to open her heart to Shuichi. Their relationship seems like more than just friends but less than lovers, but in five years, Fumika came back from Tokyo to see Shuichi. Their feelings overlap and their childhood times slowly begin to move.

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.ja: アトリ マイ ディア モーメンツ

description.en: “ATRI -My Dear Moments- is a popular novel game. This work, which boasts strong popularity both domestically and internationally, has been adapted into a comic by Jako with a transparent touch. In a calm town sinking into the sea, the “unforgettable summer” of a boy and a robot girl begins.”
description.vi:
Một phần của nền văn minh loài người đã bị nuốt chửng bởi sự dâng cao bất thường của mực nước biển, nguyên nhân vẫn chưa được làm sáng tỏ. Ikaruga Natsuki, cậu bé mồ côi mẹ và mất một chân trong tai nạn, trở về quê nhà sau nhiều năm sống khổ cực tại thành phố lớn. Tuy nhiên, khi về đến nơi, tất cả những gì cậu thấy chỉ là căn nhà cũ đã bị ngập dưới nước. Cậu không còn ai thân thuộc, chỉ có chiếc tàu và tàu ngầm do bà để lại, cùng với một khoản nợ lớn phải trả.

Cơ hội duy nhất để Natsuki lấy lại ước mơ về tương lai là nhận lời mời của Catherine - kẻ thu nợ đáng ngờ. Họ cùng nhau đi tìm kho báu trong phòng thí nghiệm dưới biển của bà Natsuki, nơi có tin đồn bà đã giấu một điều gì đó quý giá. Nhưng khi đến nơi, họ không tìm thấy tiền bạc hay đá quý, thay vào đó là một cô gái kỳ lạ đang ngủ say trong quan tài. Cô ấy tên là Atri.

Atri là một người máy, nhưng cô sở hữu vẻ ngoài và cảm xúc như một con người thật sự. Cô biết ơn Natsuki vì đã giải thoát mình khỏi quan tài, và nói với cậu:

"Em muốn hoàn thành ý nguyện cuối cùng của chủ nhân. Cho đến lúc đó, em sẽ là chân của anh!"

Trong thị trấn nhỏ dần chìm trong biển, một mùa hè đáng nhớ sắp diễn ra với cậu bé và cô gái người máy bí ẩn...

altTitles.ja: 亜人

altTitles.th: Ajin อาจิน สายพันธุ์อมนุษย์
สายพันธุ์อมนุษย์

description.en: The story follows a high school student named Kei Nagai, who is caught in a traffic accident, dies, but immediately revives and learns he is not human, but an Ajin, a mysterious creature that cannot die. Scared, he runs away from humans but is helped by his friend Kai, who joins him in his flee from civilization. He then becomes involved in a conflict between human and Ajin and must choose a side.
description.ru:
Бессмертие. Не этого ли всегда жаждало человечество? Да, так было ровно до тех пор, пока по всему миру не начали появляться люди, неспособные умереть. Солдаты богов, полулюди. Загадка тысячелетия. Необъяснимый феномен эволюции и любимая игрушка учёных. Самое пугающее свойство полулюдей в том, что ими может оказаться кто угодно. «Ты не узнаешь правду, пока не умрёшь». Нагаи Кей умер… И он больше никогда не умрёт.  
  
**Note**: Roughly mid-way through the manga, the Author Tsuina Miura left this project.  
  
- Nominated for the 7th Manga Taishou Award

description.uk: Старшокласник Нагаї Кей загинув у дорожньо-транспортній пригоді, але відразу ж ожив, дізнавшись, що він може бути не таким, як усі інші люди. Натомість він може бути таємничою майже безсмертною істотою, наділеною не тільки силою омолодження, але й здатністю бачити надприродних істот. Злякавшись, він тікає, і його друг допомагає йому втекти від суспільства. На жаль для Кея, триває полювання, і незабаром він потрапить у конфлікт між людством та іншими подібними до нього.
description.pt-br: A história segue um estudante do ensino médio chamado Kei Nagai, que é pego em um acidente de trânsito, morre, mas imediatamente revive e descobre que não é humano, mas um Ajin, uma criatura misteriosa que não pode morrer. Assustado, ele foge dos humanos, mas é ajudado por seu amigo Kai, que se junta a ele em sua fuga da civilização. Ele então se envolve em um conflito entre humano e Ajin e deve escolher um lado.

altTitles.zh: 全民神祇：我献祭亿万生灵成神

altTitles.en: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King

description.en:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

altTitles.ja: ぷにるはかわいいスライム

description.en: The first unique romantic comedy manga in the history of CoroCoro! The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!
description.ja: コロコロ史上初、異色のラブコメまんが！！ 自分の作ったスライムが女の子に変身!?　ぷにるの自由気ままな言動に少年・コタローは振り回されっぱなし。毎日愉快なドキドキ生活だ!!

description.en:
In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!

description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

description.en: Obsessed with medieval fantasies, Marina develops a revolutionary VR device that can bring fictional worlds to life. Her dreams come true when she transports herself to Lasnorok, the setting of her own novel. The problem is, she can't get back out! Disguised as a runaway slave boy named Rino, she comes face-to-face with the main character she created, the ambitious Edward Allen Dihas. Can Marina help him overthrow the emperor and survive to make it out alive?

description.en:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.
Reincarnate into an alien world, bring  forth golden light unto humble creatures—demons and monsters. Shine light on mysteries. Light or Death—at arm's length.
description.zh: 重活一世入他乡，斩妖除魔育金光。 以身入局寻真相，死生有命踏八荒。

description.en: A certain country long ago. A rare mermaid with transformed legs was brought to the castle, supposed to be presented to the king of a neighbouring country... But the prince who saw her suddenly said, "Would you like to be my princess?" A communal life starts from there! How will the love of these two people go?
description.ja:
昔々のとある国。一匹の人魚が城につれてこられた。脚が二股に分かれたその珍しい人魚は、隣国の王に贈呈される予定だという…だが、その人魚を見た王子は言った。「お前、俺の妃にならないか！」

そこから始まるまさかの共同生活！二人（匹）の恋の行方はいかに――！？
description.pt-br: Era uma vez, em um certo país. Uma sereia foi levada ao castelo. A estranha sereia com duas pernas iria ser entregue ao rei de um país vizinho... Mas quando o príncipe a viu, disse: "Você! Quer ser a minha princesa?!" E assim começa uma inesperada vida em comum! Como se amarão os dois (animais)? Uma comédia de amor de conto de fadas sobre duas pessoas que estão apaixonadas, começando, começando...

altTitles.ja: かりそめの公爵夫人

description.en:
The naïve Yvona is ready to do anything for her amazing fiancé! Summon magical beasts and let him take the glory? Sure! Wreck her body for a powerful spell and die for him? Yes! Watch him secretly embrace her trusted cousin Tristan with passion and deride her openly? Oka— wait. What? Just then, Yvona dies... and wakes up a year in the past with a burdened heart. Armed with her knowledge, Yvona's ready to fight for herself. And hmm, maybe form an alliance with the coldhearted Duke of Azentine...

---
I died miserably on the day I found out the truth. The truth that my fiancé had a hidden lover, and it was my very own male cousin.

On the second morning, after my 20th birthday, a miracle happened. From that point on, I decided not to believe in love anymore. I want to have a relationship with no strings attached and without any superficial feelings such as love.

"Duke Agentine, will you marry me?"

This proposal was nothing more than a marriage to keep up appearances and without love involved.

---

description.fr: Je suis morte misérablement, le jour où j’ai découvert la vérité. La vérité, c’est que mon fiancé avait un amant caché et c’était mon propre cousin. Le lendemain de mon 20e anniversaire, un miracle s’est produit. A partir de là, j’ai décidé de ne plus croire à l’amour. Je veux avoir une relation sans aucune condition et sans sentiments superficiels tels que l’amour. «Duke Agentine, voulez-vous m’épouser?» Cette proposition n’était rien de plus qu’un mariage pour garder les apparences et sans amour impliqué.
description.id:
Di hari kedua setelah ulang tahunku yang ke-20, sebuah keajaiban terjadi. Pada hari itu: aku mengetahui sebauh kenyataan: tunanganku memiliki selingkuhan, seorang sepupuku satu-satunya. Sejak itu, aku sudah tidak lagi percaya dengan yang namanya cinta, dan mati dengan mengenaskan.

Ketika aku terbangun, aku kembali ke masa lalu. Kali ini, aku hanya ingin memiliki hubungan tanpa adanya ikatan, dan tidak lain tidak bukan hanya karena sebuah kepentingan. Jadi, aku memberinya lamaran pernikahan, hanya untuk mencapai kepentingan bersama. "Duk Agentine, maukah kamu menikah denganku?"
description.mn: Үнэнийг олж мэдсэн тэр өдөр... Би өрөвдөлтэйгөөр нас барсан. Тэрхүү үнэн гэвэл намайг хэн бэ гэдгээр минь хардаг гэж санаж ирсэн сүйт залуу маань үеэлтэй маань янаг амрагийн холбоотой байсан гэх явдал. Би дэндүү харалган явж. Гэвч гайхамшиг биелэлээ олон, би жилийн өмнөхрүүгээ буцаж ирсэн. Энэ мөчөөс эхлэн би ахиж хайр гээч зүйлд итгэхгүй. Хэн нэгний хайрыг хүсч, түүний төлөө өөрийгөө золиослохгүй! Зөвхөн өөрийнхөө төлөө амьдрах болно!
description.pt-br: Eu morri miseravelmente, no dia em que descobri a verdade. A verdade é que meu noivo tinha um amante escondido e era meu primo.Na segunda manhã, depois do meu aniversário de 20 anos, aconteceu um milagre. A partir daí, decidi não acreditar mais no amor.Eu quero ter um relacionamento sem amarras e sem sentimentos superficiais, como o amor."Duquesa Agentine, quer se casar comigo?"Essa proposta nada mais era do que um casamento para manter as aparências e sem o amor envolvido.

description.en:
As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins, Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady, have you gone crazy?"

"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement."

But, she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him, and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life, Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings, forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year, she offers a deal to her fiancé, Milian Pastellio, with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise, their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

---

description.id:
Sebagai anak kedua, Karina menghabiskan hidupnya selalu mengalah pada kakak-adiknya. Suatu hari, dia diberitahu bahwa menggambar yang merupakan hobinya, membuat sisa hidupnya hanya tinggal satu tahun lagi. Tak ingin terus hidup tidak dianggap oleh keluarganya, dia memutuskan untuk pergi dari rumah. Dengan persiapan seadanya, dia pergi ke tempat tunangan yang tidak begitu dia kenal untuk menghabiskan sisa hidupnya.

description.it:
Come figlia di mezzo che non è né l'erede né gli amati gemelli più piccoli, Karina ha vissuto tutta la sua vita nascosta agli altri. Lei, che aveva un solo hobby della pittura, ha scoperto che le restava solo 1 anno di vita. Quindi senza un piano, è andata a trovare il suo fidanzato che conosceva a malapena... Per annullare il fidanzamento come aveva sempre voluto.

"Non voglio tergiversare. Voglio passare un anno qui."

"...Mia Signora, sei impazzita?"

"In cambio, accetterò di annullare il fidanzamento."

Ma allora non lo sapeva. Che avrebbe ricevuto l'amore incondizionato che non aveva mai ricevuto per tutta la vita da lui, e che sarebbe arrivata ad avere un desiderio per vivere la sua vita un tempo priva di significato.

description.ja:
家門の跡を継ぐ長子でも、家族の愛を独占できる末っ子でもない、中途半端な2番目として、いつも誰かの影で生きてきたカリナ。 絵を描くことが唯一の趣味だった彼女は、自分に残された時間があと少しだということを知り、今まで交流もなかった婚約者に会いに行くことに。 婚約破棄の書類を胸に抱いて… 「ここにいさせてください」 「正気か？」 「その代わり…婚約を破棄して差し上げます」 この時は思いもしなかった。あれほど望んだ無償の愛と関心を彼がくれることになるなんて。 そのせいで、どうでもよかった人生に未練を抱くことになるなんて…

description.ko:
가문의 후계자도, 귀여움을 독차지하는 막내도 되지 못한 어중간한 둘째로,
평생 다른 사람들에게 가려진 삶을 살아온 카리나. 
그림을 그리는 것만이 유일한 취미인 그녀는
자신에게 남은 시간이 고작 1년 뿐이라는 사실을 알게 된다. 

그래서 교류도 없던 약혼자를 무작정 찾아갔다.
그가 원하던 파혼 서류를 품에 고이 간직한 채.

"단도직입적으로 말하자면, 여기서 1년간 지내고 싶어요."
"......미쳤나, 영애?" 
“대신 파혼해 드릴게요.”

하지만 그땐 미처 알지 못했다. 
평생 가지지 못했던 대가 없는 관심과 애정을 그에게 받게 될 줄은.
그래서 미련 없던 삶에 이토록 욕심이 생기게 될 줄은.

description.ru:
Карина всю жизнь находилась в чужой тени. Абсолютно обычная, ни наследница рода, ни милашка, как ее младшие – близняшки. Однажды она узнает, что ей остался всего год. Поэтому она тут же помчалась к своему жениху, неся с собой заявление на расторжение брака, о котором ее жених, должно быть, так грезил.— Скажу прямо, я хочу прожить здесь год.— Миледи, вы с ума сошли?..— За это я дам вам развод.Вот только кое-чего она не знала.— Похоже, вы продолжаете делать вид, будто не замечаете, поэтому мне придется это сказать.— Скажите.— Вы мне нравитесь.Она никогда даже надеяться не смела, что просто так получит его расположение. Поэтому она и не думала, что у нее появится настолько сильное желание в жизни, к которой она не была готова.

description.uk:
Вона не була спадкоємицею сім'ї, або навіть милою і обожнюваною молодшою дитиною, але неоднозначною середньою дитиною, Карина, та, яка завжди буде затьмарювати інших. Дівчина, чиє єдине хобі полягало в тому, щоб малювати, дізналася, що їй залишилося жити всього один рік.
Так, вона раптом пішла в гості до свого нареченого, з яким у неї ніколи не було ніяких взаємодій. У її руках були документи, необхідні для анулювання їх заручин, так само, як він хотів.

"Чесно кажучи, я хочу жити тут один рік."
"...Ти збожеволіла, молода міс?"
"В обмін на це я розірву заручини."

Однак тоді вона не знала, що отримає всю увагу і прихильність, яку не отримувала все своє життя.

---

altTitles.ja: 偏愛カフェ

description.en: Somewhere there is a strange café called "Statice" where all sorts of even stranger people meet, each with a very special and different fetish. The owner, Mr. Sennichi, welcomes these special customers every day, and tries to help them solve their fetish related problems.
description.ja: 人は誰しも秘密を抱え、思い煩う。たとえばそれが、他人には理解し難い性的嗜好なら尚――。“生理血嗜好、加虐性愛、妊婦性愛、人形性愛”これはカフェ「statice」に訪れた性的倒錯者（パラフィリアン）による、裸の告白。

description.en:
Are we allowed to be so excited?
A 9pm curfew, no short skirts, no independence unless married.
K-Hee-won grew up in a Confucian family and dreamed of freedom.
K - Jihwan, the son of a serf, fights to keep the family name alive.
Will their daring plan for freedom succeed?

title.en: S Rank Boukensha de aru Ore no Musume-tachi wa Juudo no Father Con deshita

altTitles.en: My Daughters, S-Rank Adventurers, Have a Severe Obsession With Their Father

altTitles.ja: Sランク冒険者である俺の娘たちは重度のファザコンでした

altTitles.ru: Мои дочери, которые являются искателями приключений S-ранга, очень сильно увлеклись

altTitles.zh: 身为S级冒险者的我，女儿却是重度父控

description.en: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaiser, finds three babies who were the only survivor of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!
description.ja:
将来を嘱望されていた最年少のＡランク冒険者カイゼルは自分のミスで守るべき村をドラゴンに焼き尽くされてしまう……。絶望の淵に立たされた彼が、焼け野原で見つけたのが村の唯一の生き残りである――３人の赤ん坊だった。希望の光に満ちた赤ん坊を胸に、カイゼルは誓う。

「この子たちは、俺が立派に育て幸せにしてみせる！」

時は経ち、娘たちは彼の尽力の甲斐もあり立派に成長を遂げ、剣技に、経営に、魔法に、稀有な才能を花開かせようとしていた。

だけど、困ったことが1つだけ……。
優秀過ぎる娘たちが父・カイゼルを大好き過ぎて――!?

title.en: The Way of a Flowery Sword

description.en: Viola Winchester, a lady who chose to become captain of the royal knights of the Anslan kingdom. However, she was accused of running away during the war against the dragon, which cost her noble title and also her position as captain of the royal knights. Feeling unfair, Viola looked for a way to restore her position. Until one day a respected Marquess in the kingdom named Johan Quentin came to help and asked for cooperation by... getting married?!
description.id: Viola Winchester, seoarang Lady yang memilih menjadi kapten royal knight kerajaan Anslan. Namun dia dituduh melarikan diri saat perang melawan naga, yang membuat dia harus kehilangan gelar bangsawan dan juga posisinya sebagai kapter royal knight. Merasa tidak adil, Viola pun mencari cara untuk memulihkan posisinya kembali. Sampai suatu hari seorang Marquess yang disegani di kerajaan bernama Johan Quentin datang untuk membantu dan mengajak kerja sama dengan cara... menikah?!

title.en: Yuusha Densetsu no Uragawa de Ore wa Eiyuu Densetsu o Tsukurimasu: Oudou Goroshi no Eiyuutan~

altTitles.en: I Shall Create the Hero's Legend Behind the Hero's Legend: The Heroics of A Royal-Road Killer〜

altTitles.ja: 勇者伝説の裏側で俺は英雄伝説を作ります 〜王道殺しの英雄譚

description.en:
Yukina was a young man who hailed from the same village as the Yuusha who shouldered the fate of the world. Through a certain incident, he got ahold of the talking spear, Gram. It was a weapon that was on par with the legendary sword the Hero wielded. The first volume of an adventure fantasy of the youth with a realistic growth!

**Note:**
The artist Mao retired at chapter 20 and was replaced by Kuuma Arai at chapter 21.
description.id:
Yukina adalah seorang pria muda yang berasal dari sebuah desa di mana sang pahlawan yang memikul beban dunia juga berasal.  
Karena suatu insiden, dia mendapatkan sebuah tombak yang dapat berbicara bernama Gram. Dan itu adalah senjata yang setara dengan pedang legendaris yang dimiliki oleh sang Pahlawan.  
Kisah fantasi petualangan para pemuda dengan pertumbuhan yang realistis dimulai!

description.en: Since childhood, Noah has been plagued by a debilitating condition – hallucinations. When a mysterious murder rocks the town, the voices whisper that Noah holds the key to the killer’s identity. As Noah grapples with the truth, a series of unsettling events begin to unfold around her.

altTitles.ja: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい

altTitles.id: Gadis Serigala Mencoba Untuk Berpura pura Tidak Peduli

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference

description.en:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!
